channel.title: I made an old man trip on a banana
channel.description: one day, i was walking eating a banana i threw it on the floor...then an old person tripped on it....then hes like (what is with you people?!??!? dont dump your garbish) then 10 secs passed and then he broke his spine.....the dude had no life insurance....couldint offered to be in a hospital....i was gonaa get sue....and then i had a idea....*i will operate him my self* so i did....the dude was screaming i dident have the sleep dot....and i dident get sue.....and the old man died of scream....good thing i dident get sue YEA G0 ME

item.title: I made an old man trip on a banana
item.dc:creator: @zoss0 Zoss
item.description:
@zoss0 wrote:

[quote=“Bebemycat2, post:3, topic:60180”][quote author=rickrock link=topic=86561.msg920599#msg920599 date=1171960513]
no one should every download kasperky anti virus cause i was gonaa play Wow (as usual) and sings kept popin out and closing the window of Wow notes like (allow firefox.exe)and i kept saying allow but it still kept popping out and then today i saw my comp memory and it was low as hell and i had to delete half of my files…even Wow sniff and only firefox,multitranse and mopar…i had to take my desktop background too…this is why you should never i mean NEVER EVER NEVER DOWNLOAD kasperky cheapy anti-virus p.s:i never used my computer again cause it wouldint turn on cause kasperky did an automatic shut down and i had to buy another computer
[/quote]
ROFL! Ever hear of formating?

Truly I couldm’t understand most of what you said. Please re-write it in a legible form.[/quote]

White Castle:

What’s goin’ on?!

We are laughing at him for him saying never use Kaspersky. But I use something better =)

Read full topic
